statusText.perText: Higher CPU usage, Higher fan speed
statusText.quietText: Lower CPU usage, Lower fan speed

statusText.gamingText: CPU Overclocking will be activated automatically while game launches

popup.text: Change will be effective after restarting computer.

driverPopup.text: You need install driver for RAM Overclock to  make it effective

legionEdgeModal.line1:
With Vantage Edge, your settings will be automatically tuned based on usage. 
 Maximum performance when gaming, longer battery life when you're not.
legionEdgeModal.line2:
Feature Management Overview
Some features not available on all devices
legionEdgeModal.line3:
CPU Overclocking
Boost the maximum speed for your processor
legionEdgeModal.line4:
RAM Overclocking
Boost the maximum speed for your memory
legionEdgeModal.line5:
Network Boost
Prioritize network traffic for the game you're playing
legionEdgeModal.line6:
Dolby
Tune your audio specifically for gaming with Dolby technology
legionEdgeModal.line7:
Hybrid Mode
Disable advanced GPU settings when not gaming to boost battery performance
legionEdgeModal.line8:
Rapid Charge
Game on the go longer with quicker battery charging
legionEdgeModal.line9:
Touchpad Lock
Prevent mistaken inputs by disabling the touchpad while gaming
legionEdgeModal.line10:
Auto Close
Clear processes that are not needed for gaming before you start playing to maximize available system resources
legionEdgeModal.line11:
Thermal Mode
Set your preferred device profile for fan speed and cooling control

systemInfo.systenTooltip: Hover on CPU/GPU/RAM and different drives to show their descriptions including manufature and model info

macroKey.title: Macro Key
macroKey.introLine: You can record a series of key input, and use them in gaming or other operations.

whileGaming.title: Macro Key enabled only when gaming
whileGaming.description: It will be enabled when you game and remain as num key when you don't.

intro.title: CREATE A MACRO KEY FOR
intro.line1: click the start recording button below

recording.title: START TYPING
recording.description: 20 inputs with in 20 seconds can be recorded.

keep.title: Keep Delay
keep.description: Intervals of key actions will be kept and applied when using this macro key.

ignore.title: Ignore Delay
ignore.description: Intervals of key actions will be ignored.

clearMacrokey.title: Are you sure to clear this macro key?

timeoutRecording.title: Time Out For Recording.
timeoutRecording.body: Recording will time out if no input for 20 seconds.

maximumInput.title: Maximum Input Reached.
maximumInput.body: Macro key can only store inputs less than 20.

inputStopped.title: Time Out For Recording.
inputStopped.body: Recording will time out if the input stopped for more than 10 seconds.

tutorial.para1: Just a few more buttons to press before we can have liftoff.
tutorial.para2: Before we can give you the most optimal experience there are still a few things to setup.
tutorial.howMachinUsed: Click on one of these uses to tell is how you will use this machine?
tutorial.howOnesMachinUsed: Click on one of these uses to tell is how you will use this machine?

systemStatus.title: System Status
systemStatus.subtitle: QUICK CATCH UP YOUR DEVICE STATUS.

systemUpdate.title: Systemopdatering
systemUpdate.notFound: Der blev ikke fundet en systemopdatering

Illegal.title: This system may not support battery that
Illegal.description: is not genuine Lenovo-made or authorized. The system will continue to boot, but may not charge with unauthorized batteries.
Illegal.description2: Lenovo has no responsibility for the performance or safety of unauthorized batteries, and provides no warranties for failures or damage arising out of their use.

Good.title: The battery is in good Condition

Exhaustion.title: The battery has failed due to normal
Exhaustion.description: wear. The battery cannot be charged. Replace the battery.

Bad.title: A battery error has occurred.
Bad.description: The battery cannot be charged/discharged . Replace the battery.

NotGood.title: The battery is not in a good Condition

LimitedACAdapterSupport.title: Limited Support AC Adapter
LimitedACAdapterSupport.description: to your Lenovo computer that will impact system performance and charging speed. Please reconnect the proper AC adapter.

NotSupportACAdapter.title: Not support AC Adapter
NotSupportACAdapter.description: Your Lenovo computer doesn't support this AC adapter. It may cause sudden shutdown.Please connect a correct AC adapter

ACAdapterNotSupported.title: AC adapter not supported.
ACAdapterNotSupported.description: Your Lenovo computer doesn't support this AC adapter. It may cause sudden shutdown.Please connect a correct AC adapter

EnoughPowerACAdapter.title: AC adapter cannot provide enough power
EnoughPowerACAdapter.description: to your Lenovo computer that will impact system performance and charging speed. Please reconnect the proper AC adapter.

MissingDriver.title: The Lenovo Power Manager Driver is not installed or not working properly. Please run Windows Update to install the latest driver
MissingDriver.description: is not installed or not working properly. Please run Windows Update to install the latest driver

power.title: Strøm
power.subtitle: Strømindstillinger
power.description: I denne sektion kan du justere den termiske ydeevne dynamisk og maksimere batteriets levetid.Den indeholder også andre populære strømrelaterede funktioner.Du kan kontrollere standardindstillingerne i denne sektion og tilpasse systemet i henhold til dine behov.

powerSmartSettings.title: Smarte strømindstillinger
powerSmartSettings.subtitle: INTELLIGENT KØLING
powerSmartSettings.description1: Denne funktion justerer dynamisk termoindstillingerne efter dine behov.
powerSmartSettings.description2: Intelligent køling justerer blæserens hastighed, den maksimale temperatur på overfladen og ydeevnen.Denne funktion har undertilstande og er nu tilgængelig via skyderen til ydeevnebaseret strømstyring i Windows.
powerSmartSettings.description3: Intelligent køling afbalancerer automatisk den termiske ydeevne, så den tilpasses til dine behov.
powerSmartSettings.description13: This feature dynamically adjusts thermal settings to your needs. When on, it adjusts settings to keep the device cooler or quiet, while being held or idle. Otherwise, it optimizes performance while the device is on a stable surface. When off, you can manually set thermal priority.
powerSmartSettings.description14: This feature enables you to adjust your fan speed, maximize the system performance, or extend your battery life if needed. It has three modes below. You also can switch the modes using hotkeys (Fn+Q) or from Lenovo Vantage Toolbar.

gotoWindows.title: Gå til Windows-indstillinger
gotoWindows.modalBodyText1: Klik på Windows-batteriikonet på proceslinjen for at få adgang til skyderen til ydeevnebaseret strømstyring i Windows

intelligentCooling.title: Intelligent køling
intelligentCooling.apsHint: For at kunne aktivere Intelligent køling skal du installere og aktivere Lenovo Active Protection System.

readMore.line2: Skyderen er i midten.Blæserens hastighed og ydeevnen afbalanceres dynamisk for at få den bedste brugeroplevelse.
readMore.line3: Skyderen er helt til højre.Blæserens hastighed og den tilladte overfladetemperatur er højere for at få den optimale ydeevne.

selectedModeText.quiteCool: This mode enables the best experience with fan speed and system performance balanced. For example, when in gaming, it optimizes the performance. While in the office, it reduces the noise.
selectedModeText.batterySaving: This mode enables the maximum battery life by automatically adjusting the brightness, changing the power settings, disabling features on advanced image processing, etc.
selectedModeText.performance: This mode enables the maximum system performance. In this mode, the fast fan speed might cause big noise.

coolingModesList.list1: Click on the windows battery-icon in the toolbar
coolingModesList.list2: The windows battery gauge will appear, slide the slider to choose between optimal time or optimal performance.

alwaysUSB.title: USB altid tændt
alwaysUSB.description: Oplad USB-enheder med computerens USB altid tændt-stik, når din computer er i slumre-, dvaletilstand eller slukket.
alwaysUSB.checkbox: Aktivér USB-opladning fra computerens batteri, når computeren er slukket.

easyResume.title: Easy Resume
easyResume.description: Enable this feature to improve your resume time if you frequently open and close your computer's lid.
easyResume.tooltip: This feature will improve your resume time if you frequently open and close your computer’s lid. When enabled, your computer will enter a low power mode when you close its lid, but it will resume instantly if you reopen your lid within 15 minutes of closing it. This feature also allows your notebook to attempt to finish pending activities (such as sending email or downloading a file) before the system goes into suspend.

vantageToolbar.title: Værktøjslinjen i Lenovo Vantage
vantageToolbar.description: Fastgør Vantage-værktøjslinjen til Windows-proceslinjen, så du nemt kan få flere oplysninger om batteriet og få adgang til dine hurtige indstillinger.

batteryThreshold.title: Opladningsgrænse for batteri
batteryThreshold.description: Hvis du primært bruger computeren med vekselstrømsadapteren tilsluttet og kun sjældent bruger strøm fra batteriet,kan du øge batteriets levetid ved at sætte den maksimale opladningsværdi til mindre end 100 %.
batteryThreshold.tooltip: Hvis batteriet er opladet til over opladningsgrænsen, skal du frakoble strømadapteren, indtil batteriet er afladet til eller under opladningsgrænsen.
batteryThreshold.noteInfo: Battery Charge Threshold is still not fully active. Please unplug your machine and allow your battery to drain to or below the stop-charging threshold.

popup.title: Aktivér opladningsgrænse for batteri
popup.description1: Ved at bruge tilpasset opladning af batteriet kan du forlænge den samlede batterilevetid, mens du bruger enheden.
popup.description2: For at aktivere denne funktion fuldt ud skal du tage maskinens strømstik ud og

options.checkboxText: Automatically set the start charging threshold 5 percentage points below the stop charging threshold.

expressCharging.title: Hurtig opladning
expressCharging.description: Hurtig opladning gør det muligt for batteriet at blive fuldt opladet meget hurtigere end i normal tilstand.
expressCharging.tooltip: Ved hjælp af hurtig opladning kan du oplade systemets batteri meget hurtigere,men det kan reducere batteriets levetid.

conservationMode.title: Bevaringstilstand
conservationMode.description: Denne funktion kan bruges til at forlænge batteriets levetid, når den er tilsluttet.

tooltip.line1: Denne funktion kan bruges til at forlænge batteriets levetid, når den er tilsluttet.
tooltip.line2: Når denne tilstand er aktiveret, oplades batteriet kun med en kapacitet på 55-60 %, og batteriets levetid kan maksimeres.
tooltip.line3: Bemærk! Hurtig opladning og bevaringstilstand kan ikke være aktiveret på samme tid.

airPlanePower.title: Flytilstand
airPlanePower.description: Beskyt flyets vekselstrømskontakt ved at styre systemets strømforbrug.

audio.title: Lyd
audio.subtitle: Lydindstillinger
audio.description: I denne sektion kan du automatisk optimere eller fuldt ud

audioSmartsettings.title: Smarte lydindstillinger
audioSmartsettings.subtitle: PROGRAMBASEREDE INDSTILLINGER
audioSmartsettings.description: Juster automatisk lydindstillinger i henhold til forskellige apps, du bruger.

voip.title: Automatisk lydoptimering til VoIP
voip.tooltip: Skift automatisk til Dolby-stemmetilstand under VoIP-opkald for at levere en tydelig, ensartet stemmekvalitet.

note.title: bemærk
note.description: Lenovo Vantage har ikke tilladelse til at få adgang til din mikrofon.Aktivér adgang til din mikrofon for Lenovo Vantage-appen.

microphone.title: Mikrofon
microphone.tooltip: Du kan tilpasse mikrofonens effekt ved at justere mikrofonens lydstyrkeog angive den rette tilstand.

volume.title: Microphone Volume
volume.description: Dolby Audio delivers rich, clear, powerful sound from all the content you enjoy, select appropriate mode for your content and equipment.

suppress.title: Suppress keyboard noise
suppress.tooltip: Toggle this on to optimize the MIC audio by suppressing keyboard noise.

acoustic.title: Acoustic Echo Cancellation
acoustic.tooltip: Toggle on this feature to optimize your MIC audio by reducing acoustic echo.

optimize.title: Optimize my microphone for:
optimize.tooltip: Configure microphone effect to enhance your audio experience by different scenarios and environment.

displayCamera.title: Skærm og kamera
displayCamera.subtitle: Indstillinger for skærm og kamera
displayCamera.description: I denne sektion kan du forbedre din visuelle oplevelse og konfigurere egenskaberne for kameraet.

eyeCareMode.title: Øjenbeskyttelsestilstand
eyeCareMode.checkbox: Planlæg øjenbeskyttelsestilstand fra solnedgang til solopgang
eyeCareMode.tooltip: Øjenbeskyttelsestilstand justerer automatisk din skærms farvetemperatur, så blåt lys filtreres ud, og dine øjne belastes mindre.
eyeCareMode.onSunsetToSunriseScheduleDescription: Planlæg øjenbeskyttelsestilstand fra solnedgang til solopgang

note.title: Bemærk
note.description: Lenovo Vantage skal have adgang til dine placeringsoplysninger for at beregne tiden for solnedgang og solopgang i dit område.

dispColorTemp.title: Daytime color temperature
dispColorTemp.tooltip: Eye Care Mode adjusts the color temperature of your display to filter out blue light and reduce eye strain.
dispColorTemp.onSunsetToSunriseScheduleDescription: Schedule eye care mode from sunset to sunrise

note.title: Note
note.description: When the Eye care mode is enabled. this color temperature does not take effect. However,  you can drag the slide to get a preview of it. To make it effective. turn off the Eye care mode

privacyGuard.title: Privacy guard
privacyGuard.description: This feature prevents other people from peeking at your screen. When on, it changes the viewing angle of your display, keeping it private from those around you. You also can toggle modes by pressing the "Fn+D" keys.
privacyGuard.note: Privacy Guard does not work in screen portrait mode. In this mode, your screen is still visible from the sides.
privacyGuard.labelText: Enable this feature when typing passwords

oledPowerSettings.title: OLED Power Settings
description: Your computer's OLED display can also reduce power consumption and increase battery life by selectively dimming portions of the display.
It is also recommended to dim the task bar and other areas of the display that do not change frequently to prolong the overall lifetime of the display.
oledPowerSettings.tooltip: This feature can reduce power consumption and increase battery life by selectively dimming portions of the display.

camera.title: Kamera

note.title: Bemærk
note.description: Lenovo Vantage har ikke adgangstilladelse til dit kamera.Aktivér adgang til dit kamera for Lenovo Vantage-appen.

camera.url: Gå til Windows-indstillinger for beskyttelse af personlige oplysninger

cameraPrivacy.title: Tilstand for beskyttelse af personlige oplysninger for kamera
cameraPrivacy.tooltip: Kameraet holder op med at sende live-billeder, når indstillingen for beskyttelse af personlige oplysninger er aktiveret.

camera.title: Kamera
camera.tooltip: Klik her for at nulstille egenskaberne for kameraet til standardindstillingerne.

camerablur.title: Sløret kamerabaggrund
camerablur.caption: Denne funktion slører baggrunden, når du bruger kameraet til videoopkald eller til at tage billeder.Du kan vælge en anden effekt i indstillingerne nedenfor.

inputAccessories.title: Input & Accessories
inputAccessories.subtitle: Input & Accessories Settings
inputAccessories.description: Lenovo Intelligent Sensing combines various sensors on your computer to detect your activities and adjust settings for optimal power management

hiddenKeyboardFunctions.title: Hidden keyboard functions
hiddenKeyboardFunctions.description: You can press the Fn key, on the bottom left of your keyboard, simultaneously with other keys to invoke the commands shown in the keyboard map below.

firstKeyObj.description: enable zoom feature on high resolution displays

thirdKeyObj.description: turn on and off Privacy Guard

fourthKeyObj.description: change between Performance mode and Quiet mode

smartAssist.title: Smart Assist
smartAssist.description: Lenovo Intelligent registrering kombinerer sensorer på computeren for at registrere dine aktiviteter,

HumanPresenceDetection.title: Registrering af menneskelig tilstedeværelse
HumanPresenceDetection.tooltip: Klik her for at nulstille indstillinger for registrering af menneskelig tilstedeværelse.

humanPresenceDetection.title: User Presence Sensing
humanPresenceDetection.tooltip: Click here to reset human presence Detection settings.

zeroTouchLogin.title: Logon uden berøring
zeroTouchLogin.caption: Denne funktion aktiverer eller låser automatisk computeren op, når du sidder foran den eller nærmer dig den.

zeroTouchLock.title: Lås uden berøring
zeroTouchLock.caption: Denne funktion dæmper skærmen og låser computeren, når brugeren ikke registreres som værende til stede.

autoScreenLockTimer.title: TIMER FOR AUTOMATISK LÅSESKÆRM
autoScreenLockTimer.toolTipContent: Vælg den ønskede indstilling for at låse skærmen ved hurtig/mellem/langsom hastighed, når din tilstedeværelse ikke er registreret.

distanceSensitivityAdjusting.title: DISTANCE SENSITIVITY ADJUSTING
distanceSensitivityAdjusting.caption: Den automatiske afstandsjustering opdaterer automatiskregistreringsafstanden via en AI-funktion.

note.description1: Denne funktion er afhængig af Windows Hello.
note.description2: Funktionen bruger sensorer og kameraet til at registrere din tilstedeværelse.
note.description3: 1.Hvis din computer er i Telt-, Tablet- eller Støtte-tilstand,fungerer disse funktioner muligvis ikke korrekt.
note.description4: 2.Hvis computeren er i slumretilstand eller er slukket.Automatisk logon til infrarødt kamera fungerer ikke.
note.description5: 3.Juster computerskærmen til en vinkel, så detinfrarøde kamera kan genkende dit ansigt til automatisk logon.

WindowsLink.goToWindowsHello: Gå til indstillinger for Windows Hello

intelligentScreen.title: Intelligent Screen
intelligentScreen.description: Lenovo Intelligent Sensing combines the various sensors on your computer to detect your activities and adjust settings for power management. For example, it will dim your display if it detects you are walking but will not dim it if it detects you reading.

autoScreenOff.title: Auto screen off
autoScreenOff.caption: Automatically turn off display when face-down or walking.
autoScreenOff.note: This feature is not available if your Power Plan settings are set to "never turn off the screen on battery " in the Windows Settings "System section". Please select a value other than "Never" to enable this feature.
autoScreenOff.windowsLink: Go to Power & sleep settings in Windows settings

keepMyDisplay.title: Keep my display
keepMyDisplay.caption: Keep my display when I am reading or browsing.

displaySlider.title: Minutes Before display dims when browsing

activeProtectionSystem.title: Active Protection System
activeProtectionSystem.description: The Lenovo Active Protection System is an autonomic feature that helps protect your hard drive from damage caused by strong physical shock and vibration. It continuously monitors that movement of your computer and temporarily stops the hard drive when a fall or similar damaging event is predicted.

activeProtection.title: Active Protection
activeProtection.caption: Change the sentivity, in low sensitive mode, only harder shocks will activate protection

manualActiveProtectionSuspension.title: Manual Active Protection Suspension
manualActiveProtectionSuspension.caption: Allow me to manually suspend the Active Protection System

advanced.description: To improve the access to the hard disk drive during tablet use, suspend Active Protection System when the following activities are detected

pen.title: Pen Input
pen.description: When pen input is used, Enable APS when pen input is out of range

touch.title: Touch Input
touch.description: When Touch input is used, Enable APS when touch input is not detected

hand.title: Hand proximity sensing on computer edges
hand.description: When tablet mode is enabled, Enable APS when hand is not detected

intelligentMedia.heading: Intelligent Media
intelligentMedia.title: Zero Touch Video Playback
intelligentMedia.desc: This feature will pause the video when you are leaving the computer and resume the video when you are back.
intelligentMedia.tooltip: This feature is not applicable to Web video players. Popular local video players, such as Windows Media Player, 5KPlayer, and etc. support this feature.

popup.rebootForceMsg: Den eller de valgte opdateringer vil få systemet til at genstarte automatisk efter installationen.
popup.shutdownForceMsg: Den eller de valgte opdateringer vil få systemet til at lukke ned automatisk efter installationen.
popup.rebootDelayedMsg: Den eller de valgte opdateringer vil medføre, at systemet genstartes efter installationen. Undgå at lukke systemet ned eller frakoble strømkilden eller tilbehør, mens opdateringerne installeres. Vi anbefaler, at du gemmer dit arbejde, inden systemet genstartes.
popup.rebootRequiredMsg: For at du kan installere opdateringerne skal du genstarte computeren for at sikre, at alt fungerer korrekt og er sikkert.

critical.title: Vigtige opdateringer
critical.tooltip: Vigtige opdateringer kan forhindre større problemer, alvorlige fejl, hardwarefejl eller ødelæggelse af data.

recommended.title: Anbefalede opdateringer
recommended.tooltip: Anbefalede driveropdateringer sikrer optimal ydeevne for computeren.

banner.neverChecked: Velkommen til brug af System Update.
banner.title: Et opdateret system er et velfungerende system.
banner.next: Næste søgning efter opdateringer er planlagt til
banner.description: Disse pakker inkluderer opdateringer til hardwaredrivere og andre systemværktøjer, der er nødvendige for den korrekte betjening af din computer. Vigtige opdateringer har også til formål at beskytte data på computeren og skal derfor installeres, så snart de er gjort tilgængelige. Hvis disse pakker ikke installeres, kan det resultere i tab af data, programfejl eller hardwarefejl.

fail.title: Nogle opdateringer blev ikke installeret korrekt.
fail.description: Der opstod en fejl under download eller installation af disse opdateringer. Kontrollér, at du er online, og sluk ikke for computeren, mens der installeres opdateringer.

updateCheckbox.failReason: Årsag til fejl: Vekselstrømsadapteren var ikke tilsluttet computeren.

availableUpdates.title: Tilgængelige opdateringer
availableUpdates.description: Disse pakker indeholder opdateringer, der er vigtige for, at computeren kan fungere korrekt. Vigtige opdateringer hjælper med at holde computeren mere sikker og pålidelig, og de skal installeres, når de bliver tilgængelige. Anbefalede opdateringer og valgfrie opdateringer hjælper med at holde softwaren opdateret og sikre, at computeren fungerer optimalt.
availableUpdates.installFailHeader: Nogle opdateringer blev ikke installeret korrekt
availableUpdates.installFailDescription: Der opstod en fejl under download og installation af disse opdateringer. Kontrollér, at du er online, og sluk ikke for computeren, mens der installeres opdateringer.

statusCodeMessage.commonFailure: Der er et problem med hentning af nye opdateringer. Prøv igen senere.
statusCodeMessage.upToDate: Der er ingen opdateringer tilgængelige. Dit system er opdateret.
statusCodeMessage.egatherException: Der er opstået en fejl under indsamling af brugeroplysninger.
statusCodeMessage.gatheringUserInfoException: Der er opstået en fejl under indsamling af brugeroplysninger.
statusCodeMessage.certificateValidationException: Opdateringsindholdsserveren er ugyldig. Prøv igen senere.
statusCodeMessage.downloadException: Der er opstået en fejl under overførslen af opdateringer.
statusCodeMessage.connectException: Der kan ikke oprettes forbindelse til opdateringsindholdsserveren.
statusCodeMessage.notEnoughDiskSpace: Der er ikke tilstrækkelig diskplads til at udføre den aktuelle opgave.
statusCodeMessage.proxyConnectionException: Der kan ikke oprettes forbindelse til proxyserveren.
statusCodeMessage.autoScriptEvaluationException: Der er opstået en fejl under evaluering af kommandofilen til automatisk konfiguration.
statusCodeMessage.localRepositoryConnectionFailureExceptio: Kan ikke oprette forbindelse til lokalt opbevaringssted.
statusCodeMessage.localRepositoryDatabaseException: Databasen til det lokale opbevaringssted findes ikke eller er ødelagt.
statusCodeMessage.networkInterruptedException: Systemopdateringsserveren er i øjeblikket ikke tilgængelig. Prøv igen senere.
statusCodeMessage.helpCenterInvalidServerException: Systemopdateringsserveren er ugyldig. Prøv igen senere.
statusCodeMessage.catalogNotFoundException: Der er ikke fundet nogen tilgængelige opdateringer til systemet.
statusCodeMessage.catalogCrcErrorException: Opdateringskataloget til systemet bliver i øjeblikket opdateret på systemopdateringsserveren. Prøv igen senere.
statusCodeMessage.catalogErrorException: Der opstod en fejl med opdateringskataloget til systemet på systemopdateringsserveren. Prøv igen senere.

homeSecurity.title: Connected Home Security
homeSecurity.trialExpiredSubtext: Upgrate to protect all of your devices

tour.welcomeDesc1: In just a few clicks you’ll be able to protect PCs, mobile devices, and connected devices for you and your family. Start your free 30 day trial now.
tour.welcomeDesc2: Connected Home Security is built directly in to Vantage for quick access to the protection status of your ecosystem and security alerts.
tour.monitor: Monitor the safety of your family's devices
tour.peaceOfMind: Get peace of mind that you are protected at all times!
tour.alreadyHave: I already have a Connected Home Security Account
tour.locationPermission: In order for this feature to function correctly you will need to enable location tracking for this device

accountStatus.title: My Connected Home Security
accountStatus.inTrialDetail2: You are currently within the trial period. You have unlimited access to all features.
accountStatus.trialExpiredDetail2: Your trial has expired and your device ecosystem is no longer being protected.
accountStatus.upgradedDetail2: Your device ecosystem is currently being protected.
accountStatus.localAccountDetail2: Click the button below to start your free 30 day trial.

warranty.subDescription1: Dette produkt har års begrænset garanti, og det er berettiget til deponeringsreparation. Kunder kan ringe til deres lokale servicecenter for at få flere oplysninger. Forhandlere kan yde reparation ved indlevering af dette produkt.
warranty.subDescription2: Vi kunne ikke finde garantioplysninger for din enhed. Du kan finde flere garantimuligheder ved at gå til vores supportwebsted.

needHelp.title: Har du brug for hjælp?
needHelp.description: KONTAKT OS, SÅ VI KAN HJÆLPE DIG.
needHelp.weChatDescription: Stil os et spørgsmål på WeChat. Vi vender hurtigt tilbage med svar

quicklinks.title: Kviklinks
quicklinks.description: KONTAKT OS, SÅ VI KAN HJÆLPE DIG.

quickAccess.categoriesDesc: Find nyttige oplysninger i vores artikler.

landing.notFullyDesc: Du er ikke fuldt beskyttet. Lær, hvordan du beskytter dig selv nu.
landing.maliciousNetwork: Forhindrer computeren i at blive tilsluttet {{maliciousWifi}}skadelige netværk denne måned.
landing.subTitleOffline: Learn more on how to solve connection issues in our

common.title: Antivirus
common.recommends: Lenovo anbefaler, at du bruger McAfee til at beskytte alle dine enheder. Her får du:
common.award: Prisvindende beskyttelse mod de nyeste onlinetrusler, herunder ransomware og malware
common.dedicated: Dedikeret sikkerhed, der konsekvent overgår Defender og andre førende AV-udbydere
common.deviceToCloud: Enhed til sky-teknologi, der ikke gør din pc langsommere

mcafee.identitySubtitle: Tag initiativ til at beskytte din identitet mod tyveri og bedrag.
mcafee.supportSubtitle: Du er beskyttet på telefonen, via chat eller online i hele abonnementsperioden.
mcafee.antiSubtitle: Blokerer skadelige meddelelser, før de havner i din indbakke, ved at fjerne e-mail, der muligvis indeholder skadelige links og virus.
mcafee.virusSubtitle: Du kan have tillid til, at hvis computeren bliver inficeret med en virus, får McAfee-eksperter adgang til computeren fra en fjernplacering og fjerner den.
mcafee.parentalSubtitle: Blokerer websteder og søgeresultater, som du ikke ønsker, børnene skal se. Du kan også angive begrænsninger for, hvor meget tid de må bruge online.

container.title: Lenovo Wi-Fi-sikkerhed
container.name: WI-FI-SIKKERHED
container.disableDecribe: Lenovo Wi-Fi-sikkerhed er en udvidet skybaseret softwaretjeneste, der hjælper din enhed med at adskille sikre trådløse netværk fra dem, der er potentielt skadelige.

threatlocator.describe: Brug trusselssensoren til at bestemme sikkerheden i dine nærliggende netværk.
threatlocator.tryAgain: Vi kan ikke finde truslen for dig, fordi netværket ikke er tilgængeligt. Opret forbindelse til internettet, og prøv igen.

locationmodal.title: Aktivér placeringstjenester
locationmodal.describe1: Hvis du vil bruge Lenovo Wi-Fi-sikkerhed, skal du aktivere placeringstjenester for Lenovo Vantage. Vil du aktivere placering nu?
locationmodal.describe2: Hvis du vil bruge Tilsluttet Home Security, skal du aktivere placeringstjenester for Lenovo Vantage. Vil du aktivere placering nu?

homesecurity.title: Tilsluttet Home Security
homesecurity.titleDescription: Tilsluttet Home Security beskytter dig på tre måder:
homesecurity.homeSecurityAffect1: Tilsluttet Home Security beskytter din enhed og sikrer, at den ikke er blevet kompromitteret
homesecurity.homeSecurityAffect2: Tilsluttet Home Security sørger for, at de netværk, som du er tilknyttet, er sikre
homesecurity.homeSecurityAffect3: Tilsluttet Home Security sørger for, at andre enheder, som er knyttet til dit hjemmenetværk, er sikre.
homesecurity.describe: Usikre enheder og netværk kan introducere skadelig software, føre til identitetstyveri og lække personlige og økonomiske oplysninger. Aktivér denne indstilling for at reducere risikoen for, at din enhed og dit hjemmenetværk bliver udsat for angreb
homesecurity.subtitle: Få ro i sindet
homesecurity.subtitleDescribe: Tilsluttet Home Security sender en advarsel, hvis systemet registrerer et sikkerhedsproblem i din enhed eller dit hjemmenetværk, eller hvis du er tilsluttet et potentielt skadeligt netværk. Få mere at vide om Tilsluttet Home Security under <tag>her</tag>.

invitationcode.buttonDescribe: Du har allerede tilsluttet denne enhed til en eksisterende Tilsluttet Home Security-konto.
invitationcode.title: Har du allerede Tilsluttet Home Security?
invitationcode.titleDescribe: Sørg for, at placeringstilladelser er aktiveret for Vantage, for at du kan føje din enhed til en eksisterende Tilsluttet Home Security-konto, og for at du kan bruge Tilsluttet Home Security.
invitationcode.canUse: Nu kan du begynde at bruge Tilsluttet Home Security

vpn.title: VPN-sikkerhed
vpn.whatIsSufEasy: SurfEasy VPN krypterer de oplysninger, som du sender og modtager, så du trygt kan bruge din pc, Mac®, smartphone eller tablet på en hvilken som helst internetforbindelse uden at skulle bekymre dig.
vpn.whatCanSufEasy1: A virtual private network provider that protects you while you are online. Without a VPN, your computer may be more vulnerable to attackers and identity theft. The VPN runs silently in the background and provides security and privacy protection.
vpn.startUseSufEasy4: SurfEasy users can enjoy 250 MB of free traffic every 30 days! Follow the steps on the "Rewards" tab of the SurfEasy app to get more traffic.
vpn.howToGetData1: Confirm email to win +250 MB traffic
vpn.howToGetData2: Add a second device to win +250 MB of traffic
vpn.howToGetData3: Refer a friend and win +500 MB of traffic
vpn.howToGetData4: Like SurfEasy on Facebook, earn +100 MB of traffic,
vpn.howToGetData5: Follow SurfEasy on Twitter and win +100 MB of traffic
vpn.helpKeep: Sørg for, at dine onlineaktiviteter er beskyttede og private med SurfEasy VPN.
vpn.whySufEasyDescription: Ved at benytte Wi-Fi-hotspots, som dem, du finder på caféer eller i lufthavne, eksponerer du dine følsomme oplysninger for cyberkriminelle. SurfEasy VPN er en logfri VPN, der krypterer dine personlige oplysninger og ikke sporer eller lagrer dine onlineaktiviteter eller din placering.
vpn.startUseSufEasy: Begynd at bruge SurfEasy i dag
vpn.startUseSufEasy1: Hjælp til at sikre, at de data, som du sender og modtager, er beskyttede og private med kryptering på bankniveau.
vpn.startUseSufEasy2: Hjælp til at forhindre, at virksomheder kan spore dine onlineaktiviteter eller din placering.
vpn.startUseSufEasy3: Gratis og førsteklasses tilbud giver mange muligheder, der passer til dit behov og budget.
vpn.whatCanSufEasy2: Beskyt dine personlige oplysninger, og aktivér SurfEasy VPN, når du tilgår et offentligt Wi-Fi-hotspot. Med en Lenovo Starter VPN-plan kan du gennemføre aktiviteter med belønninger for at opnå yderligere databeskyttelsesbåndbredde. Opgradér for at beskytte op til 5 smartphones, tablets og computere med ubegrænset båndbredde.
vpn.getStarted1: Klik på knappen "Åbn SurfEasy" ovenfor for at starte SurfEasy VPN.
vpn.getStarted2: Aktivér VPN, og vent et kort øjeblik for at få bekræftelse på en sikker forbindelse.
vpn.getStarted3: Rediger dit område eller din placering, og nyd sikre og private netværksaktiviteter.
vpn.privacyPolicyAndTermsOfService: Læs mere i <tag>Politik om beskyttelse af personlige oplysninger</tag> og <tag>Vilkår for tjeneste</tag>

passwordManager.title: Adgangskodesundhed
passwordManager.whatIsPmNotInstalled: Den sikreste og nemmeste måde at gemme stærke, komplekse adgangskoder og logge på ethvert websted øjeblikkeligt.
passwordManager.whatIsPmInstalled: Et tryggere digitalt liv venter dig: Tilføj adgangskoder, aktivér overvågning af det mørke internet, udfyld automatisk personlige oplysninger og betalingsoplysninger.
passwordManager.startProtect: Begynd at beskytte dine onlinekonti på den nemmeste måde.
passwordManager.discount: Lenovo-brugere kan få en særlig rabat på 50 % på Dashlane førsteklassesabonnement.
passwordManager.offer: Dette tilbud er kun til nye Dashlane-brugere!
passwordManager.learnMoreAbout: <tag>Få mere at vide</tag> om, hvordan du får mest ud af Dashlane
passwordManager.neverForget: Dashlane: Glem aldrig en adgangskode igen
passwordManager.whatIsDashLane: Dashlane er en app til adgangskodebeskyttelse og digital beskyttelse, der fungerer sammen med din browser. Appen gemmer automatisk adgangskoder og personlige oplysninger, husker dem for dig og lagrer det hele på en sikker måde. Dashlane analyserer også din kontosikkerhed og gør det nemt for dig at forbedre din adgangskodesundhed.
passwordManager.helpYou1: Appen husker et ubegrænset antal brugernavne og adgangskoder.
passwordManager.helpYou2: Log på med det samme overalt, og få problemfri søgning på internettet
passwordManager.helpYou3: Synkronisering på tværs af enheder, så du altid har adgang til vigtige konti
passwordManager.helpYou4: Forbedring af din onlinebeskyttelse med nem og effektiv rådgivning
passwordManager.getStarted: Kom godt i gang med Dashlane?
passwordManager.checkOutThisGuide: Brug Dashlane til at opretholde onlinesikkerheden og spare tid og frustrationer. Du finder detaljerede oplysninger om, hvordan du kommer i gang, i <tag>denne vejledning.</tag>

passwordManager.allowsYou2: Overvåge det mørke internet, så du er informeret
passwordManager.allowsYou3: Forblive sikret på ikke-sikre Wi-Fi-netværk med indbygget VPN

windowsHello.traditional: Almindelige adgangskoder kan blive stjålet og bruges til at få adgang til din konto overalt i verden. Mere sikker og praktisk. Windows Hello er den nye generation af adgangskoder. Brug din fingeraftrykslæser i stedet for usikre adgangskoder til at logge på.

question1.title: Back up and restore your files
question1.description:
Back up and restore your files
It's always good to have a backup. Keep copies of your files on another drive in case something happens to the originals.
Set up your backup
Select the Start button, select Settings > Update & security > Backup > Add a drive , and then choose an external drive or network location for your backups.
All set. Every hour, we'll back up everything in your user folder (C:\Users\username). To change which files get backed up or how often backups happen, go to More options.
Restore your files
If you're missing an important file or folder, here's how to get it back:
1. Type Restore files in the search box on the taskbar, and then select Restore your files with File History.
2. Look for the file you need, then use the arrows to see all its versions
3. When you find the version you want, select Restore to save it in its original location. To save it in a different place, press and hold (or right-click) Restore, select Restore to, and then choose a new location.

para1.line2: Keep copies of your files on another drive in case something happens to the originals.

question2.title: How to refresh your PC
question2.description:
How to refresh your PC
Symptom
If your PC isn't performing as well as it once did, and you don't know why, you can refresh your PC without deleting any of your personal files or changing your settings. Windows can “refresh” your PC so it’s more like a fresh install without deleting your personal files.
Refresh your PC, Here is what will happen: your files and personalized settings won’t change
  • Your PC settings will be changed back to its defaults
  • Apps from windows store will be kept
  • Apps you installed from disc or website will be removed
  • A list of removed files will be saved on your desktop
Affected Brands
  • All Desktop and Laptops
Operation System
  • Windows 8, 8.1 & 10
Solution
  • Windows 8/8.1
    1. Tap or click Settings
    2. Tap or click Update and recovery
    3. Tap or click Recovery
      Under Refresh your PC without affecting your files, tap or click Get started.
    4. Click 'Next'.
    5. Click 'Refresh' to start the refresh process.
    6. Once the refresh process is done, you can find a Removed Apps list on the desktop
    7. You can find the removed apps while refreshing your system
  • Windows 10
    1. Search for refresh in the search tool available in the Start menu,
    2. Click on 'Refresh your PC without affecting your files' in the search results as shown below.
    3. Click on the Get started button just below the heading 'Refresh your PC without affecting your files' to start refreshing your Windows 10 PC.
Additional Information
In most cases, once you start to refresh your PC, it’ll finish on its own. However, if Windows needs missing files, you’ll be asked to insert recovery media, which is typically a DVD disc or thumb drive. If that happens, what you’ll need depends on your PC.
If you upgraded your PC to Windows 8.1 or Windows RT 8.1 with a DVD, use that disc. If you don’t have Windows 8.1 or Windows RT 8.1 media, contact Microsoft Support.

question3.title: How to know your machine's CPU
question3.description:
How to know your machine's CPU

Symptom

The terms 32-bit and 64-bit refer to the way a computer's processor (also called a CPU), handles information. The 64-bit version of Windows handles large amounts of random access memory (RAM) more effectively than a 32-bit system.

Affected Brands

The above symptom is associated with, but not limited to, the following systems:

  • All Desktop and Laptops

Operating System

  • Windows 7 , 8 , 10

Solution

Windows 7 or Vista

  1. Open System by clicking the Start button Picture of the Start button, right-clicking Computer, and then clicking Properties
  2. Under System, you can view the system type.

Windows 8 and Windows 10

Method 1: View the System window in Control Panel

  1. Swipe in from the right edge of the screen, and then tap Search. Or, if you are using a mouse, point to the lower-right corner of the screen, and then click Search.
  2. Type system in the search box, and then tap or click Settings.
  3. Tap or click System
  4. If you are running a 64-bit version of Windows 8, 64-bit Operating System is displayed in the System type field under the System heading. If you are running a 32-bit version of Windows 8, 32-bit Operating System is displayed in the System type field under the System heading.

Method 2: View the System Information window

  1. Swipe in from the right edge of the screen, and then tap Search. Or, if you are using a mouse, point to the lower-right corner of the screen, and then click Search.
  2. In the search box, type system information
  3. Tap or click System, tap or click System Information, and then click System Summary.
  4. If you are running a 64-bit version of Windows 8, x64-based PC is displayed in the System type field under the Item heading.

    If you are running a 32-bit version of Windows 8, x86-based PC is displayed in the System type field under the Item heading.

question4.title: Check your machine's battery use
question4.description:
Check your machine's battery use

Symptom

Windows 10 includes a new “Battery Use” screen that shows you what’s draining your laptop’s juice. That means it’ll tell you exactly what apps–both desktop and Windows 10 “universal” apps–are using too much power.

Affected Brands

  • Lenovo laptops, desktops

Affected Systems

  • All

Operationg System

  • Window 10

Solution

This feature is new in Windows 10, we need to find this feature first as it is not stored in your traditional control panel view, this feature is located in the new “Settings” app


A. Find the Battery Use Screen

1. Click or Tap the “Settings” option from the start menu

2. In Settings select “System”and then select “Battery saver.”

3. Click or tap the “Battery use” link under this heading to see more details.

B. Analyze Your Power Usage

4 You can change to make the battery use screen to display battery use from last 24 hours to last 48 hours or last from last week

5 “System,” “Display,” and “ Wi-Fi” percentages. This shows how much battery power has been used by system processes, the display,

6 The “In use” and “Background” options show how much power is used by applications while you’re using them, compared to applications running in the background.

7 If apps are using power in the background, you can click or tap the “Change background app settings” link and configure apps to not run in the background. This only works for universal Windows 10 apps.

8 Scroll down further and you will see a list of applications, this is considered as the most useful section of this feature. It will display a list of the apps have used battery power in that period, and show you what percentage of your battery power each app has used

question5.title: Use your PC like a tablet
question5.description:
Use your PC like a tablet

Tablet mode makes Windows more intuitive and easier to use when you have a touchscreen device.

Use tablet mode

To turn on tablet mode, select action center on the taskbar, then select Tablet mode .

Note

To find out if your device can automatically turn on tablet mode, search for your device on the manufacturer's website. Support for this feature depends on the hardware, the driver that's installed, and how the device was set up by the manufacturer.

In tablet mode, apps open full screen, giving you more space to work. To close an app, drag it to the bottom of the screen.

Tip

The taskbar is available when your PC is in tablet mode, but you can hide it if you want more room on the screen. Select the Start button, select Settings > System > Tablet mode , then turn on Automatically hide the taskbar in tablet mode. To see the hidden taskbar, swipe up from the bottom of the screen, or use your mouse to hover there.

Use two apps simultaneously

To use two apps side by side in tablet mode, drag an open app down and to the side. You'll see where it'll snap, and you'll see any open apps next to it.

In this view, you can also:

  • Use the shared edge between two snapped apps to resize both apps at the same time.
  • Open a new app from task view—select Task view on the taskbar, select an app, then drag it to one side to snap it into your divided screen.
  • Use the back button on the taskbar to go back in an app, or to open an app that you were using before.

question6.title: Get to know Cortona, your personal assistant
question6.description:
Get to know Cortana, your personal assistant

What is Cortana?

Cortana is your digital agent. She'll help you get things done.

The more you use Cortana, the more personalized your experience will be.

To get started, type a question in the search box, or select the microphone and talk to Cortana. (Typing works for all types of PCs, but you need a mic to talk.)

If you’re not sure what to say, you’ll see suggestions on your lock screen, and in Cortana home when you select the search box on the taskbar.

  1. Home 2. Notebook 3. Settings 4. Feedback

Here are some things Cortana can do for you:

  • Give you reminders based on time, places, or people.
  • Track packages, teams, interests, and flights.
  • Send emails and texts.
  • Manage your calendar and keep you up to date.
  • Create and manage lists.
  • Chit chat and play games.
  • Find facts, files, places, and info.
  • Open any app on your system.

Try this: Set a reminder

One of the things Cortana can do is to give you reminders. She can remind you to do things based on time, places, or even people.

For example, type or say, 'Remind me to congratulate Tanya the next time she calls.'

The reminder will appear when you get a call from Tanya.

Extra bonus—if you have a Windows phone or Cortana for iPhone or Android, you can set Cortana to sync notifications between your PC and phone.

Hey Cortana?

Set Cortana to hear you anytime you say 'Hey Cortana.' Select the search box on the taskbar to open Cortana home. Then select Settings and turn on Let Cortana respond to 'Hey Cortana.'

Note

Cortana is only available in certain countries/regions, and some Cortana features might not be available everywhere.
question6.para1: Cortana is your digital agent. She'll help you get things done.
question6.para2: The more you use Cortana, the more personalized your experience will be.
question6.para3: To get started, type a question in the search box, or select the microphone  and talk to Cortana. (Typing works for all types of PCs, but you need a mic to talk.)
question6.para4: If you’re not sure what to say, you’ll see suggestions on your lock screen, and in Cortana home when you select the search box on the taskbar.
question6.para6: Here are some things Cortana can do for you:

bulletset1.span1: Give you reminders based on time, places, or people.
bulletset1.span2: Track packages, teams, interests, and flights.
bulletset1.span4: Manage your calendar and keep you up to date.
bulletset1.span7: Find facts, files, places, and info.
bulletset1.span8: Open any app on your system.

question6.para7: One of the things Cortana can do is to give you reminders. She can remind you to do things based on time, places, or even people.
question6.para8: For example, type or say, “Remind me to congratulate Tanya the next time she calls.”
question6.para9: The reminder will appear when you get a call from Tanya.
question6.para10: Extra bonus—if you have a Windows phone or Cortana for iPhone or Android, you can set Cortana to sync notifications between your PC and phone.

para11.span1: Set Cortana to hear you anytime you say “Hey Cortana.” Select the search box on the taskbar to open Cortana home.

question6.para13: Cortana is only available in certain countries/regions, and some Cortana features might not be available everywhere.

welcometutorial.description: Vantage gør det nemt for dig at opdatere dine drivere, foretage fejlfinding, bede om support og få mere at vide om din enhed. Tilpas hurtigt din oplevelse, og få nyttige oplysninger, der er skræddersyet til dig
welcometutorial.bullets1: Se systemets status med Vantage dashboard.
welcometutorial.bullets2: Sikkerhedsrådgiver gør administrationen af sikkerheden nemmere
welcometutorial.bullets3: Automatiske opdateringer holder din enhed i topform
welcometutorial.subtitle1: Hvordan vil du bruge din enhed?
welcometutorial.privacytitle: Hjælp os med at forbedre kvaliteten af denne app ved at tillade anonym indsamling af brugsstatistik.

settings.settingsDescription: På siden med præferenceindstillinger kan du vælge at aktivere/deaktivere meddelelser om beskeder baseret på kategorierne for Vantages besked. Bemærk, at selvom alle beskedkategorierne er deaktiverede, kan du stadig få vist systemkritiske beskeder fra Vantage, når det er nødvendigt.
settings.appFeaturesDescription: Meddelelser om System Update, artikler og andre vigtige funktioner.
settings.actionTriggeredDescription: Beskeder, der er udløst af brugerens valg af indstillinger, f.eks. automatisk installation af vigtige/anbefalede opdateringer.
settings.settingsNotes: brugeren skal genstarte for at indstillingerne på denne side kan træde i kraft.
